name: Simple Billiards
description:
Click. Drag. Release. Repeat.

Get all of the cue balls (1-15, not the snooker) into the holes, and have fun!

Settings:

 - FPS Max: Set the fps limit. Ideal for low-end machine or battery saving.

 - Pre. : Set precision (angle and power) in display, doesn't affect real value. (1 -> M [15], Default 1)

 - Qlt. : Toggle game quality. (VeryLow => Ultra, Default M)
